title: Input schema for the hello_word actor.

names.title: Names
names.description: List of names from which you want to create pairs.

teamName.title: Team name
teamName.description: Name of your team. Used as a record where the historical pairs are stored. Important if you want to track history of more teams.

slackToken.title: Slack Token
slackToken.description: Access token to your Slack app.

slackChannel.title: Slack Channel
slackChannel.description: Slack Channel where the resulting pairs will be posted.

slackMessage.title: Slack Message
slackMessage.description: Optional message to introduce the created pairs.
